V10.23/Items

< V10.23
 Sign in to edit
  • View history
  • Talk (0)

Items[]

Removed items
  • Consumables: Oracle's Extract.
  • Advanced items: Bilgewater Cutlass, Catalyst of Aeons, Chalice of Harmony, Glacial Shroud, Haunting Guise, Hextech Revolver, Jaurim's Fist, Stinger.
  • Finished items: Adaptive Helm, Athene's Unholy Grail, Frozen Mallet, Hextech GLP-800, Hextech Gunblade, Hextech Protobelt-01, Iceborn Gauntlet, Liandry's Torment, Luden's Echo, Mikael's Crucible, Righteous Glory, Rod of Ages, Shurelya's Reverie, Spellbinder, Statikk Shiv, Sunfire Cape, Twin Shadows.
  • Quick Charge items: Tear of the Goddess, Archangel's Staff, Seraph's Embrace, Manamune, Muramana, Rod of Ages.
  • Boots: Boots of Speed, Boots of Mobility, Ninja Tabi.
  • Jungle items: Bloodrazor, Cinderhulk, Hunter's Machete, Hunter's Talisman, Runic Echoes, Skirmisher's Sabre, Stalker's Blade, Warrior.
  • Viktor's Glorious Evolution items: Hex Core mk-1, Hex Core mk-2, Perfect Hex Core, Prototype Hex Core.
  • Ornn's Masterwork items: Circlet of the Iron Solari, Forgefire Cape, Frozen Fist, Infernal Mask, Luden's Pulse, Might of the Ruined King, Molten Edge, Obsidian Cleaver, Rabadon's Deathcrown, Salvation, Trinity Fusion, Youmuu's Wraithblade, Zhonya's Paradox.
General
  • New Mythic item tier.
    • Can only have one Mythic item at a time.
    • Mythic items improve other Legendary items with bonus stats.
    • Mythic item icons are animated in the shop and HUD.
  • Fully upgraded support items count as Legendaries.
Abyssal Mask
  • New:
    • Recipe: Giant's Belt + Negatron Cloak + 900 = 2700.
    • Stats: 350 health, 60 magic resistance.
    • Unique Passive - Unmake: Immobilizing an enemy champion increases the damage they take by 10% for 4 seconds.
    • Limited to 1 Abyssal Mask.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Catalyst of Aeons + Negatron Cloak + 1180 = 3000.
    • Stats: 350 health, 55 magic resistance, 10% cooldown reduction, 300 mana.
    • Unique Passive - Eternity: Restore mana equal to 15% of damage taken from champions. Restore health equal to 20% of mana spent, up to 25 health per cast, while toggle abilities can heal for up to 25 per second.
    • Unique Aura: Nearby enemy champions take 15% more magic damage (325 range).
    • Ornn's Masterwork item: Infernal Mask.
      • Stats: 750 health, 100 magic resistance, 10% cooldown reduction, 300 mana.
Aegis of the Legion
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Null-Magic Mantle + Cloth Armor + 750 = 1500.
    • Stats: 30 armor, 30 magic resistance, 10 ability haste.
    • Builds Into: Gargoyle Stoneplate, Locket of the Iron Solari, Sunfire Aegis.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Null-Magic Mantle + Cloth Armor + 350 = 1100.
    • Stats: 30 armor, 30 magic resistance.
    • Builds Into: Death's Dance, Locket of the Iron Solari, Zeke's Convergence.
Aether Wisp
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Amplifying Tome + 415 = 850.
    • Stats: 30 ability power.
    • Unique Passive - Glide: +5% movement speed.
    • Builds Into: Lich Bane.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Amplifying Tome + 415 = 850.
    • Stats: 30 ability power.
    • Unique: +5% movement speed.
    • Builds Into: Ardent Censer, Lich Bane, Spellbinder, Twin Shadows.
Amplifying Tome
  • Updated icon.
  • Now builds into Bandleglass Mirror, Blighting Jewel, Cosmic Drive, Demonic Embrace, Hextech Alternator, Leeching Leer, Nashor's Tooth, Verdant Barrier.
  • No longer builds into Guinsoo's Rageblade, Haunting Guise, Hextech Revolver, Void Staff.
Archangel's Staff
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Standard version of the item now also available on Howling Abyss.
    • Recipe: Tear of the Goddess + Needlessly Large Rod + Sapphire Crystal +  1000 = 3000.
    • Stats: 60 ability power, 400 mana.
    • Unique Passive - Awe: Gain bonus ability power equal to 3% of bonus mana.
    • Unique Passive - Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Striking an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and gain 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 450 bonus mana. Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +450 mana.
    • Limited to 1 Mana Charge item.
    • Howling Abyss difference: Each charge consumed generates twice as much mana.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Tear of the Goddess + Lost Chapter + 1050 = 3200.
    • Stats: 50 ability power, 650 mana, 10% cooldown reduction.
    • Unique Passive - Haste: Grants an additional 10% cooldown reduction.
    • Unique Passive - Awe: Grants bonus ability power equal to 1% maximum mana. Refunds 25% of mana spent from abilities.
    • Unique Passive - Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 4 seconds, up to 3 charges. Each mana expenditure via an ability consumes a charge and grants +8 mana, up to a maximum of 750 mana. Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 mana.
    • Limited to 1 Awe item.
    • Howling Abyss version: Archangel's Staff (Quick Charge) (+12 mana instead of +8).
Ardent Censer
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Forbidden Idol + Blasting Wand + 650 = 2300.
    • Stats: 60 ability power, 100% base mana regeneration, 10% heal and shield power.
    • Unique Passive - Sanctify: Healing and shielding an ally enhances you and affected allies with 10% − 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 − 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit for 6 seconds.
    • Limited to 1 Ardent Censer.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Forbidden Idol + Aether Wisp + 650 = 2300.
    • Stats: 60 ability power, 50% base mana regeneration, 10% cooldown reduction.
    • Unique: +10% heal and shield power.
    • Unique: +8% movement speed.
    • Unique Passive: Outgoing healing and shielding (excluding yourself) enhances you and affected allies with Frenzy for 6 seconds. Frenzy: Grants 10% − 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 − 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit.
Bami's Cinder
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Ruby Crystal + Ruby Crystal + 200 = 1000.
    • Stats: 300 health.
    • Unique Passive - Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies, increased by 50% against minions and 100% against monsters.
    • Limited to 1 Mythic Component item.
    • Builds Into: Frostfire Gauntlet, Sunfire Aegis, Turbo Chemtank.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Ruby Crystal + 500 = 900.
    • Stats: 200 health.
    • Unique Passive - Immolate: Deals 6 − 23 (based on level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (325 range). Hitting an enemy with an immobilizing ability deals 6 − 23 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) bonus magic damage and releases a fire nova that also deals that bonus damage to nearby enemies (12 second cooldown). Immolate's damage is increased by 100% against minions and monsters.
    • Builds Into: Cinderhulk, Sunfire Cape.
Bandleglass Mirror - New item
  • Recipe: Faerie Charm + Amplifying Tome + 365 = 1050.
  • Stats: 20 ability power, 10 ability haste, 50% base mana regeneration.
  • Builds Into: Chemtech Putrifier, Imperial Mandate, Moonstone Renewer.
Banshee's Veil
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Fiendish Codex + Verdant Barrier + 400 = 2500.
    • Stats: 65 ability power, 45 magic resistance, 10 ability haste.
    • Unique Passive - Annul: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next ability. This shield refreshes after no damage is taken from enemy champions for 40 seconds.
    • Limited to 1 Banshee's Veil.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Fiendish Codex + Null-Magic Mantle + Blasting Wand + 800 = 3000.
    • Stats: 75 ability power, 60 magic resistance, 10% cooldown reduction.
    • Unique Passive - Spell Shield: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability. This shield refreshes after no damage is taken from enemy champions for 40 seconds.
Berserker's Greaves
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Boots + Dagger + 500 = 1100.
    • Stats: 45 movement speed, 35% attack speed.
    • Limited to 1 Boots item.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Boots of Speed + Dagger + 500 = 1100.
    • Stats: 35% attack speed.
    • Unique Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 flat movement speed.
    • Limited to 1 Boots item.
B. F. Sword
  • Updated icon.
  • No longer builds into Essence Reaver.
Black Cleaver
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Caulfield's Warhammer + Kindlegem + Long Sword + 1050 = 3300.
    • Stats: 300 health, 40 attack damage, 25 ability haste.
    • Unique Passive - Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion reduces their armor by 4% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times for a maximum of 24%. Enemies with 6 stacks are Shredded.
    • Unique Passive - Butcher: Basic attacks (on-hit) and damaging abilities against fully Shredded enemies deal bonus physical damage equal to 5% of their missing health, reduced to 2% of their missing health for damage over time effects (0.5 second cooldown).
    • Limited to 1 Black Cleaver.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Phage + Kindlegem + 950 = 3000.
    • Stats: 400 health, 40 attack damage, 20% cooldown reduction.
    • Unique Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them,  reducing their  armor by 4% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times for a maximum of 24%.
    • Unique Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants ( 20 / 10) movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant ( 60 / 30) movement speed for 2 seconds instead.
    • Ornn's Masterwork item: Obsidian Cleaver.
      • Stats: 550 health, 60 attack damage, 20% cooldown reduction.
Black Mist Scythe
  • Updated icon.
  • This item counts as a Legendary item.
  • Attack damage reduced to 20 from 25.
  • Health reduced to 75 from 100.
  • Unique active renamed to Ward from Warding.
  • Limited to 1 Support or Jungle item.
Blade of the Ruined King
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Vampiric Scepter + Recurve Bow + Pickaxe + 325 = 3100.
    • Stats: 40 attack damage, 30% attack speed, 12% life steal.
    • Unique Passive - Mist's Edge: Deal ( 10% / 6%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 60 bonus damage against minions and monsters.
    • Unique Passive - Siphon: Attacking a champion 3 times deals 40 − 120 (based on level) magic damage on-hit and steals 25% of their movement speed for 2 seconds (20 second cooldown).
    • Limited to 1 Blade of the Ruined King.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Bilgewater Cutlass + Recurve Bow + 700 = 3300.
    • Stats: 40 attack damage, 25% attack speed, 12% life steal.
    • Unique Passive: Basic attacks deal ( 12% / 8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 damage against all targets, and a maximum of 60 damage against minions and monsters.
    • Unique Active: Instantly deal 100 magic damage and slow the target by 25% for 3 seconds, while also increasing your own movement speed by 25% for the same duration ( 550 range) (90 second cooldown).
    • Ornn's Masterwork item: Might of the Ruined King.
      • Stats: 55 attack damage, 40% attack speed, 12% lifesteal.
Blasting Wand
  • Updated icon.
  • Now builds into Ardent Censer, Demonic Embrace, Everfrost, Hextech Rocketbelt, Luden's Tempest, Nashor's Tooth, Night Harvester, Riftmaker, and Staff of Flowing Water.
  • No longer builds into Banshee's Veil, Liandry's Torment, Luden's Echo, and Rod of Ages.
Blighting Jewel - New item
  • Recipe: Amplifying Tome + 815 = 1250.
  • Stats: 25 ability power, 15% magic penetration.
  • Builds Into: Void Staff.
  • Limited to 1 Void Pen item.
Bloodthirster
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: B. F. Sword + Cloak of Agility + Vampiric Scepter + 600 = 3400.
    • Stats: 55 attack damage, 20% life steal, 20% critical strike chance.
    • Unique Passive - Blood Barrier:  Life steal from basic attacks can now overheal you, converting the excess healing into a shield that absorbs up to 50 − 350 (based on level) damage and slowly decays if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.
    • Limited to 1 Bloodthirster.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: B. F. Sword + Vampiric Scepter + Long Sword + 950 = 3500.
    • Stats: 80 attack damage.
    • Unique: +20% life steal.
    • Unique Passive: Your  life steal overheals you, converting the excess healing into a shield that absorbs up to 50 − 350 (based on level) damage and decays when out of combat for 25 seconds.
Boots - New item
  • Replaces Boots of Speed.
  • Cost: 300.
  • Stats: 25 movement speed.
  • Builds Into: Berserker's Greaves, Mobility Boots, Boots of Swiftness, Ionian Boots of Lucidity, Mercury's Treads, Plated Steelcaps, and Sorcerer's Shoes.
  • Limited to 1 Boots item.
Boots of Swiftness
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Boots + 600 = 900.
    • Stats: 60 movement speed.
    • Passive: Reduces the effectiveness of slows by 25%.
    • Limited to 1 Boots item.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Boots of Speed + 600 = 900.
    • Unique Passive - Enhanced Movement: +60 flat movement speed.
    • Unique Passive - Slow Resist: Reduces the effectiveness of slows by 25%.
    • Limited to 1 Boots item.
Bramble Vest
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Cloth Armor + Cloth Armor + 200 = 800.
    • Stats: 35 armor.
    • Unique Passive - Thorns: When struck by an attack, deal 3 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and inflict them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds if they are a champion.
    • Builds Into: Thornmail.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Cloth Armor + Cloth Armor + 400 = 1000.
    • Stats: 35 armor.
    • Unique Passive - Thorns: Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects 3 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage, while also inflicting Grievous Wounds on the attacker for 3 seconds.
    • Builds Into: Thornmail.
Bulwark of the Mountain
  • Updated icon.
  • This item counts as a Legendary item.
  • Ability power reduced to 20 from 25.
  • Health reduced to 250 from 300.
  • Unique active renamed to Ward from Warding.
  • Limited to 1 Support or Jungle item.
Caulfield's Warhammer
  • Updated icon.
  • Ability haste increased to 10 from 0.
  • Unique cooldown reduction reduced to 0% from 10%.
  • Now builds into Chempunk Chainsword, Manamune, Navori Quickblades, Prowler's Claw, Ravenous Hydra, Serylda's Grudge, and Umbral Glaive.
  • No longer builds into Warrior and Youmuu's Ghostblade.
Chain Vest
  • Updated icon.
  • Now builds into Death's Dance and Frostfire Gauntlet.
  • No longer builds into Gargoyle Stoneplate, Knight's Vow, and Sunfire Cape.
Chempunk Chainsword - New item
  • Recipe: Executioner's Calling + Ruby Crystal + Caulfield's Warhammer + 400 = 2700.
  • Stats: 45 attack damage, 200 health, 15 ability haste.
  • Unique Passive - Hackshorn: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds, increased to 60% if the target is below 50% of their maximum health.
  • Limited to 1 Chempunk Chainsword.
Chemtech Putrifier - New item
  • Recipe: Oblivion Orb + Bandleglass Mirror + 450 = 2300.
  • Stats: 50 ability power, 15 ability haste, 100% base mana regeneration.
  • Unique Passive - Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds. Immobilizing champions applies 60% Grievous Wounds instead.
  • Limited to 1 Chemtech Putrifier.
Cloak of Agility
  • Updated icon.
  • Cost reduced to 600 from 800.
  • Critical strike chance reduced to 15% from 20%.
  • Now builds into Bloodthirster, Galeforce, Guinsoo's Rageblade, Immortal Shieldbow, Kraken Slayer, Lord Dominik's Regards, Mercurial Scimitar, Navori Quickblades, and The Collector.
Cloth Armor
  • Updated icon.
  • Now builds into Gargoyle Stoneplate, Glacial Buckler, Plated Steelcaps, Randuin's Omen, and Turbo Chemtank.
  • No longer builds into Glacial Shroud and Ninja Tabi.
Control Ward
  • Updated icon.
  • Can now also be stored into Stirring Wardstone, Watchful Wardstone, and Vigilant Wardstone.
Corrupting Potion
  • Updated icon.
  • New Effect: Magic damage over time increased to 20 from 15 for champions who cannot gain mana.
  • Effect during potion is no longer called Touch of Corruption.
  • Limited to 1 type of Potion.
Cosmic Drive - New item
  • Recipe: Fiendish Codex + Kindlegem + Amplifying Tome + 865 = 3000.
  • Stats: 70 ability power, 200 health, 30 ability haste.
  • Unique Passive - Spelldance: Dealing damage with abilities grants 10 (+ 20% ability haste) bonus movement speed for 4 seconds.
  • Limited to 1 Cosmic Drive.
Crystalline Bracer
  • Updated icon.
  • Now builds into Knight's Vow.
  • No longer builds into Redemption, Shurelya's Reverie, and Righteous Glory.
Cull
  • Updated icon.
  • Unique gold generation passive is now called Reap.
Dagger
  • Updated icon.
  • Now builds into Guinsoo's Rageblade, Hearthbound Axe, Noonquiver, and Rageknife.
  • No longer builds into Stinger.
Dark Seal
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Cost: 350.
    • Stats: 15 ability power, 40 health.
    • Unique Passive - Glory: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill, 1 for assists, up to a maximum of 10. Lose 4 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to Mejai's Soulstealer.
    • Unique Passive - Dread: Gain 5 ability power for each stack of Glory.
    • Limited to 1 Glory item.
    • Builds into: Mejai's Soulstealer.
  • Old:
    • Cost: 350.
    • Stats: 10 ability power, 100 mana.
    • Passive: +25% increased healing from potions and refillable potions.
    • Unique Passive - Dread: Grants +3 ability power per stack of Glory.
    • Unique Passive - Do or Die: Grants 2 Glory (+6 AP) for a champion kill and 1 Glory (+3 AP) for an assist, up to a maximum of 10 Glory stacks (+30 AP). Upon death, lose 4 Glory stacks (-12 AP).
    • Builds into: Mejai's Soulstealer.
Dead Man's Plate
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Winged Moonplate + Ruby Crystal + Chain Vest + 900 = 2900.
    • Stats: 475 health, 40 armor, 5% movement speed.
    • Unique Passive - Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 5 stacks of Momentum each 0.25 seconds, granting up to 60 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 5 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Attacks deal 1 magic damage on-hit per stack of Momentum, consuming all stacks. At max stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second if the attacker is melee.
    • Limited to 1 Dead Man's Plate.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Chain Vest + Giant's Belt + 1100 = 2900.
    • Stats: 425 health, 60 armor.
    • Unique Passive - Dreadnought: Generates a maximum of 100 Momentum stacks by moving, which grant up to 60 bonus movement speed. Momentum decays by 3 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized.
    • Unique Passive - Crushing Blow: Basic attacks discharge all stacks to deal (1 per stack) bonus magic damage on-hit, up to 100. Basic attacks at 100 stacks also slow by 50% for 1 second. This damage can critically strike.
    • Limits: On ranged champions, Crushing Blow cannot slow. However, Momentum will still discharge on-hit.
Death's Dance
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Chain Vest + Caulfield's Warhammer + Pickaxe + 325 = 3100.
    • Stats: 50 attack damage, 40 armor, 15 ability haste.
    • Unique Passive - Ignore Pain: ( 35% / 15%) of physical damage taken is dealt over 3 seconds instead.
    • Unique Passive - Defy: Champion takedowns grant you 30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, remove Ignore Pain's remaining damage, and heal you for 10% of your maximum health over the duration.
    • Limited to 1 Death's Dance.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Aegis of the Legion + Caulfield's Warhammer + Vampiric Scepter + 500 = 3600.
    • Stats: 50 attack damage, 30 armor, 30 magic resistance, 10% cooldown reduction.
    • Unique Passive: Instantly  heal for 15% of all damage dealt. Area damage and pet damage only heal 5% for every unit affected.
    • Unique Passive: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, which is successively taken as damage over time true damage instead, dealing one-third of the stored damage every second.
Demonic Embrace - New item
  • Recipe: Blasting Wand + Giant's Belt + Amplifying Tome + 815 = 3000.
  • Stats: 70 ability power, 350 health.
  • Unique Passive - Azakana Gaze: Dealing ability damage to enemies causes them to take 1.5% of their maximum health as magic damage every second for 4 seconds. Gain 10 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance while enemies are afflicted, increased by 2.5 for each additional champion affected.
  • Limited to 1 Demonic Embrace.
Divine Sunderer - New item
  • Recipe: Phage + Sheen + Kindlegem + 700 = 3300.
  • Stats: 40 attack damage, 400 health, 20 ability haste.
  • Unique Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, deal bonus physical damage equal to 10% of target's maximum health on-hit, minimum damage is equal to 150% of base AD (1.5 second cooldown). Damage is capped against monsters at 250% base AD. When Spellblade hits a champion, heal for ( 50% / 30%) of the bonus damage dealt.
  • Mythic Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5% armor penetration and 5% magic penetration.
  • Limited to 1 Mythic item.
  • Ornn's Masterwork item: Deicide.
    • Stats: 55 attack damage, 550 health, 25 ability haste.
Doran's Blade
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Cost: 450.
    • Stats: 80 health, 8 attack damage.
    • Unique Passive - Warmonger: +2.5% omnivamp.
  • Old:
    • Cost: 450.
    • Stats: 80 health, 8 attack damage, 3% life steal.
Doran's Ring
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Cost: 400.
    • Stats: 70 health, 15 ability power.
    • Unique Passive - Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
    • Unique Passive - Drain: Killing a minion restores 6 mana, if you can't gain mana, restore 3 health instead.
  • Old:
    • Cost: 400.
    • Stats: 60 health, 15 ability power, 5 mana per 5 seconds.

  • New:
    • Recipe: Sheen + Aether Wisp + Blasting Wand + 600 = 3000.
    • Stats: 80 ability power, 10% movement speed.
    • Unique Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 150% base AD (+ 60% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit (2.5 second cooldown).
    • Limited to 1 Lich Bane.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Sheen + Aether Wisp + Blasting Wand + 450 = 3200.
    • Stats: 80 ability power, 7% movement speed, 250 mana, 10% cooldown reduction.
    • Unique Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 75% base AD (+ 50% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit (1.5 second cooldown).
Locket of the Iron Solari
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Kindlegem + Aegis of the Legion + 400 = 2700.
    • Stats: 30 armor, 30 magic resistance, 200 health, 20 ability haste.
    • New Unique Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a 250 − 420 (based on target's level) shield that decays over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown). This effect is reduced by 75% if the target has been affected by another Locket of the Iron Solari in the last 20 seconds.
    • Unique Passive - Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions 5 bonus armor and 5 bonus magic resistance.
    • Mythic Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items to increase Consecrate's bonus resistances by 2.
    • Limited to 1 Mythic item.
    • Ornn's Masterwork item: Reliquary of the Golden Dawn.
      • Stats: 40 armor, 40 magic resistance, 400 health, 25 ability haste.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Aegis of the Legion + Null-Magic Mantle + 650 = 2200.
    • Stats: 30 armor, 60 magic resistance.
    • Unique Active: Grants a decaying shield to nearby allied champions and yourself for up to 2.5 seconds, absorbing up to 130 − 300 (based on highest level between target and caster) (+ 20% of caster's bonus health) damage ( 650 radius) (120 second cooldown). Shielded targets are Eclipsed for 20 seconds.
    • Eclipsed: Additional Locket of the Iron Solari shields are only 25% as effective.
    • Ornn's Masterwork item: Circlet of the Iron Solari.
      • Stats: 45 armor, 75 magic resistance.

Manamune
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Standard version of the item now also available on Howling Abyss.
    • Recipe: Tear of the Goddess + Caulfield's Warhammer + Sapphire Crystal + 750 = 2600.
    • Stats: 35 attack damage, 400 mana, 15 ability haste.
    • Unique Passive - Awe: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 2% of maximum mana.
    • Unique Passive - Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Striking an enemy or ally with an attack or ability consumes a charge and gain 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 450 bonus mana. Transforms into Muramana at +450 mana.
    • Limited to 1 Mana Charge item.
    • Howling Abyss difference: Each charge consumed generates twice as much mana.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Tear of the Goddess + Pickaxe + 675 = 2400.
    • Stats: 35 attack damage, 250 mana.
    • Unique Passive - Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2% maximum mana. Refunds 15% of mana spent from abilities.
    • Unique Passive - Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 4 seconds, up to 3 charges. Each basic attack on-hit or mana expenditure via an ability consumes a charge and grants +5 mana, up to a maximum of 750 mana. Transforms into Muramana at +750 mana.
    • Limited to 1 Awe item.
    • Howling Abyss version: Manamune (Quick Charge) (+6 mana instead of +5).

    • Unique Active - Wraith Step Gain +20% bonus movement speed and ghosting for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown).
    • Unique Passive - Haunt: +40 movement speed out-of-combat.
    • Limited to 1 Youmuu's Ghostblade.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Caulfield's Warhammer + Serrated Dirk + 700 = 2900.
    • Stats: 55 attack damage, 10% cooldown reduction.
    • Unique: +18 lethality.
    • Unique Passive: +40 movement speed out-of-combat.
    • Unique Active: Gain +20% movement speed and ghosting for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown).
    • Ornn's Masterwork item: Youmuu's Wraithblade.
      • Stats: 75 attack damage, 10% cooldown reduction.
      • Unique: +25 lethality.
Zeal
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Cloak of Agility + Dagger + 300 = 1200.
    • Stats: 18% attack speed, 15% critical strike chance.
    • Unique Passive - Zealous: +7% movement speed.
    • Builds Into: Mortal Reminder, Phantom Dancer, Rapid Firecannon, Runaan's Hurricane.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Cloak of Agility + Dagger + 300 = 1400.
    • Stats: 12% attack speed, 25% critical strike chance.
    • Unique: +7% movement speed.
    • Builds Into: Phantom Dancer, Rapid Firecannon, Runaan's Hurricane, Statikk Shiv.
Zeke's Convergence
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Kindlegem + Glacial Buckler + 700 = 2400.
    • Stats: 30 armor, 250 mana, 20 ability haste, 300 health.
    • Unique Active - Conduit: Designate an ally as the Accomplice. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
    • Unique Passive - Convergence: When you immobilize an enemy, for the next 4 seconds your Accomplice's basic attacks (on-hit) and abilities deal 25 − 50 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage to that enemy.
    • Limited to 1 Zeke's Convergence.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Aegis of the Legion + Glacial Shroud + 250 = 2250.
    • Stats: 60 armor, 250 mana, 10% cooldown reduction, 30 magic resistance.
    • Unique Passive: Casting your ultimate ability within range of your Conduit grant both of you bonus effects for 10 seconds. You are surrounded with a 300 range Frost storm which slows enemies within it by 20%, and your Conduit's basic attacks burn their target with Fire dealing 30% bonus magic damage over 2 seconds (45 second cooldown).
    • Unique Passive - Frostfire Covenant: If an enemy is both struck by Frost and Fire, your Frost storm ignites and becomes Frostfire. A Frostfire storm, deals 40 magic damage per second to nearby enemies and slows by 40% instead for 3 seconds.
    • Unique Active: Designate an allied champion within 1000 range as your Conduit and form a link with them (0.5 second cooldown).
Zhonya's Hourglass
  • Updated icon.
  • New:
    • Recipe: Seeker's Armguard + Stopwatch + Fiendish Codex + 50 = 2500.
    • Stats: 65 ability power, 45 armor, 10 ability haste.
    • Unique Active - Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering yourself untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but becoming unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities or item actives, or use any summoner spells during this time (120 second cooldown).
    • Limited to 1 Zhonya's Hourglass.
  • Old:
    • Recipe: Seeker's Armguard + Stopwatch + Fiendish Codex + 250 = 2900.
    • Stats: 75 ability power, 45 armor, 10% cooldown reduction.
    • Unique Active - Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering yourself untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but becoming unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities or item actives, or use any summoner spells during this time (120 second cooldown).
    • Ornn's Masterwork item: Zhonya's Paradox.
      • Stats: 100 ability power, 60 armor, 10% cooldown reduction.
